scripts.deps:install: npm run deps:install:backend && npm run deps:install:frontend
scripts.deps:validate: npm run deps:validate:backend && npm run deps:validate:frontend
scripts.deps:circular: npm run deps:circular:backend && npm run deps:circular:frontend
scripts.deps:graph: npm run deps:graph:backend && npm run deps:graph:frontend
scripts.dep:baseline: npm run deps:generate && mkdir -p docs/dependency-baseline && cp backend/dependency-graph.svg docs/dependency-baseline/backend-dependency-graph.svg && cp backend/module-dependencies.svg docs/dependency-baseline/backend-module-dependencies.svg && cp frontend/dependency-graph.svg docs/dependency-baseline/frontend-dependency-graph.svg && cp frontend/module-dependencies.svg docs/dependency-baseline/frontend-module-dependencies.svg
scripts.deps:graph:backend: cd backend && npm run dep:graph && npm run dep:modules && npm run dep:archi
scripts.deps:graph:frontend: cd frontend && npm run dep:graph && npm run dep:components && npm run dep:archi
scripts.docs:api: npm run docs:api:backend && npm run docs:api:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.phase4:fix-trivial: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.phase4:analyze-deps: npm run deps:graph && npm run deps:cross-module
scripts.check-deps: npm run deps:circular && npm run deps:validate
scripts.adr:html: npm run adr:regen-viz && npm run adr:gen-index && npm run adr:render-all
